kpi.name: RNC_2717a
kpi.formula: (INTERSHO.con_drps_is_hho_ul_dch_q_rt + INTERSHO.con_drps_is_hho_ue_pwr_rt + INTERSHO.con_drps_is_hho_dl_dpch_rt + INTERSHO.con_drps_is_hho_rscp_rt + INTERSHO.con_drps_is_hho_ecno_rt + INTERSHO.CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_IM_IMS_RT + INTERSHO.CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_EMERG_CALL + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_CAPA_UL_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_CAPA_DL_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_PRX_TOT_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_PTX_TOT_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_RSVR_SC_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_RES_LIM_RT + INTERSHO.CONDR_IS_HHO_SB_RT + INTERSHO.CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_WPS_RT + INTERSHO.CON_DRPS_GANHO_AMR_RT)

kpi_info.title: Connection drops during ISHO, RT
kpi_info.use: The number of connection drops during Inter-System Handover, RT
kpi_info.formula:
sum( con_drps_is_hho_ul_dch_q_rt +
con_drps_is_hho_ue_pwr_rt +
con_drps_is_hho_dl_dpch_rt +
con_drps_is_hho_rscp_rt +
con_drps_is_hho_ecno_rt +
CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_IM_IMS_RT +
CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_EMERG_CALL +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_CAPA_UL_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_CAPA_DL_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_PRX_TOT_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_PTX_TOT_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_RSVR_SC_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_LB_RES_LIM_RT +
CONDR_IS_HHO_SB_RT +
CON_DRPS_IS_HHO_WPS_RT +
CON_DRPS_GANHO_AMR_RT )
